TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Recognizer extends System.Object

Docs.remarks: Recognizers operate in a DialogContext environment to recognize user input into Intents and Entities. This class models 3 virtual methods around * Pure DialogContext (where the recognition happens against current state dialogcontext * Activity (where the recognition is from an Activity) * Text/Locale (where the recognition is from text/locale) The default implementation of DialogContext method is to use Context.Activity and call the activity method. The default implementation of Activity method is to filter to Message activities and pull out text/locale and call the text/locale method.
